title: Remove 'Service is the highest duty' subtitle line from homepage founder section

requirements.summary: Remove the English subtitle line 'Service is the highest duty' from the founder section on the Home page while keeping the Hindi motto text intact
acceptanceCriteria: The text 'Service is the highest duty' does not appear anywhere on the Home page.
The Hindi motto 'मानव सेवा परमो धर्मः' remains visible in the founder section.
No other content in the founder section is removed or altered.

file_operations.description: Remove the English subtitle line 'Service is the highest duty' from the founder section. Locate the text element or paragraph containing this English translation of the Hindi motto and delete it entirely. Ensure the Hindi motto 'मानव सेवा परमो धर्मः' remains visible and all other founder section content (name, title, description, image) is unchanged.
